query: SELECT Category, [Plan], Version, Company, CLosureDate, GroupCustomerID, GroupCustomerName, BusinessType, DestinationCountry, GroupProductID, GroupProductName, UOM, Quantity, GroupCurrencyTotalAmount, GroupCurrencyCOGS1Amount, GroupCurrencyCOGS2Amount, HomeCurrency, PlanRate, ProductFix FROM val.STG_SALES_PLAN_HIST WHERE CLosureDate >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()) - 2, 1, 1)
